string.value: While I was busy secretly placing sacks of rice on both Chil Sung's and Chil Nam's stacks back and forth, I was finally caught red-handed by Chil Sung. Chil Sung thanked me for strengthening the love and bond between the brothers even more. He also said that Chil Nam might have noticed it himself, and wanted me to go see him.

I was busy transfering multiple sacks of rice for Chil Sung and Chil Nam on each other's stacks, but was caught red-handed. The brothers seemed genuinely thankful for helping them strengthening the love and bond between the brothers even more. He also said that Chil Nam might have noticed it himself, and wanted me to go see him.

아니! 그 쌀가마니는 뭐죠? 동생네 집에 가져다 놓아 달라고 했는데 왜 도로 가져오시는 거에요? 네?! 동생이 부탁을 했다구요? 아... 역시 동생은 사려가 깊군요. 그래서 지금까지 볏섬이 줄어들지 않은 거로군요. 저희 형제 때문에 괜한 수고를 하시게 했네요. 이 일로 저희 형제사이가 더욱 가까워 진 것 같아요. 아마 지금쯤 동생도 눈치챘을 거에요. 수고스러우시겠지만 마지막으로 제 동생 칠남이에게 가보세요. 동생도 고마움을 표시하고 싶어할 것 같군요.
동생의 마음을 거절하지 마세요. 저희 형제는 당신에게 정말 고마움을 느끼고 있답니다.

Hey, what's that sack of rice you're carrying right now? I asked you to leave it at my brother's house, and ... what are you doing bring it back here? What? My brother was the one making the request? Ahhh ... that's my brother there. No wonder my stack of rice hasn't shrunk one bit...

So you went through all this trouble thanks to us brothers... thankfully, this incident is bound to make our brotherly bond that much tighter. I think my brother may have noticed it by now, too. I know it's a lot of work, but please go visit my brother Chil Nam right now. I'm sure he wants to find a way to say thank you for your hard work.
Please don't Say no. We are eternally grateful for your great work and generosity.

Hi, there. I've noticed it, too. I was wondering why my stack of rice didn't shrink at all, and I just got a message from my brother about what happened. I really don't know how to thank you for going through all this trouble...

I will never forget your hard work in this. I can't give you anything right this minute, but if you ever feel like feasting on some pork and buckwheat paste, please come visit us. My brother and I will make the best possible food you'll find in this town, just for you.
I don't think you met up with my brother. Please go see him; he's waiting for you.
